body_html:
Thanks for the quick answer.

I tried to get it exposed by following this tutorial and copy-paste-editing here.

But now I am stuck. I am happy to help and expose this functionality but my c/c++ is very rusty. If you could give me a pointer to some material or a function which was exposed the same way I would be very happy.

body:
Thanks for the quick answer.

I tried to get it exposed by following [this](http://pytorch.org/tutorials/advanced/c_extension.html) tutorial and copy-paste-editing [here](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/21ff182809a18758628f42ee44c61658c2b45de5/torch/lib/THC/THCCachingAllocator.cpp#L479).

But now I am stuck. I am happy to help and expose this functionality but my c/c++ is very rusty. If you could give me a pointer to some material or a function which was exposed the same way I would be very happy.
